‚ÄúThe reason I'm posting this is to steer lower back pain sufferers to at least try Sour Diesel and let us know. 

I've been chasing the atypical below-the-belt analgesia of Sour Diesel. It must not be universally felt, but for those that get it, it's a godsend. The head is pretty focused and clear, and below the belt it's like a bit of an epidural. 

I've gotten this effect from Sour Diesel flowers, Full Melt and even...‚Äù

Feel: A dense nug with a very a sticky feel too it
Smell: A sour pungent skunky smell that takes over the whole room.
Taste: Taste almost like a smoky sour candy.
High: One sticky is all you need for this to kick it's quick, it's mean and it gives you a crazy cerebral high with super amazing effects that will make colors sound and everything just great.‚Äù

‚ÄúHave some right now over all favorite strain smoke it day time and night time anytime wake n bake , before bed good uplifting high good for anxiety and if your looking for a nice sativa for the day this is the bud that you would want ! :)‚Äù

‚ÄúDefinitely one of my favorite strains, gets you very active, felt like  combination of mind and body high. Your thoughts race, makes you creative. And the smell of it is incredible.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain smells sufficiently pungeant that I knew it had to be good.  And whew-eeeeeee.   Three to four puffs baked me in a very enjoyable way.   A good body high.  This strain loosened up my prostrate nicely and gave me an extra good flow.  Definitely no couch lock, although I relaxed on a couch and enjoyed myself for the whole high.  And a nice, intense cerebral experience.  Not everything became funny.  Althoug...‚Äù

‚ÄúThe buds I received were medium/large, they had good bud appeal, however there was some Fox tailing. The smell was a sweet diesel/ tar and the smoke was smooth. The high was good, I felt uplifted and happy but I was quite unsociable. The high lasted for a medium time.‚Äù
‚ÄúI was so high and unfocused it was like i was on a different level.‚Äù

‚ÄúJust had this for the second time last night, and I can say without a doubt that last night was genuinely one of the best nights I've ever had. I smoked with some close friends I haven't seen in awhile, smoked two joints and two bowls, and on our way back, me and my bro hooked up with two amazing girls who were also high. Good stuff, try this if you haven't already. 10/10‚Äù

‚Äúsmall amounts- i get happy,  energy,  euphoric and creative. 

large amounts- i get lethargic, hungry, heavy eyes and passout 

seriously it just became my favorite sativa over GC. it's so versatile as well that i can use it at all times and not be dreading my choice.  love love love!‚Äù

‚ÄúSour Diesel is consistently a potent and pungent medicine with a sativa affect unlike any other. The golden hue of trichomes produces a heady punch. This strain gives a most glorious feeling that starts with the brain and drives down the body with that smooth irie feeling.‚Äù

‚ÄúOnce you get past the wrotten taste and realize the bud is not bad or old and you have not been taking rips off the tailpipe,SD is a classic old school sativa buzz that wipes away lazy and becomes very creative and energetic.A top 5 Sativa for sure SD is a great wake and bake or 3-4 good bong rips before work and stress free ready to get going.If you are new to Cannabis use with caution especially before doing anythi...‚Äù

‚ÄúProbably one of the best morning/mid-day highs out there. The uplifting and creative effects this strain delivers is one of a kind and is a real boost that is best experienced when active. I suffer from UC and tbh the pain was slightly numbed but not completely taken away so i don't recommend this strain for pain relief, however the psychoactive effects basically takes away all stress and depression leaving me fulfil...‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is a nice strain if you don't want to be couch locked but also don't want to be super productive. It's a very specific situational strain.‚Äù

‚ÄúIt is sleepy weed. It made me feel very nonproductive. I expected the usual Sativa effects, but got the opposite. I only wake up to eat. I have fallen asleep with the pipe in my hand, almost every time. I have discovered this acts more as an Indica for me.‚Äù

‚ÄúLove this strain. I'm usually an Indica fan, but I got a great deal today on this flower from Swell today. Wow, it hits hard real fast, great happy vibe at first. ‚ÄúTried Absolute Xtracts Sour Diesel. 
I personally don't recommend it for people who: 
1) suffer from anxiety
2) are beginners
3) sensitive to THC

Otherwise, I can see how others really like this one.

My experience: Took 2 hits and started feeling it about 10-15mins after. It definitely woke me up.

First wave was euphoric, but mixed with a bit of paranoia (but only because I've had a few bad experiences when I get ...‚Äù

‚ÄúStrong smell and decent potency this strain makes for a truly distinct flavor and aroma profile.  The flowers are generally soft and when cured are very delicate.  A relaxing smoke which motivates appetite.  This is a good flavor enjoyed from a vaporizer or from a pipe.  Try mixing strains to give expounded flavors.  Such as lemon haze + sour diesel = lemon diesel or purple kush + sour diesel = purple diesel kush.‚Äù
